title.en: Kusuriya Keiei shite Mitara, Rieki ga Osoroshii Koto ni narimashita - Heimin Dakara to Tsuihousareta Moto Kyuutei Renkinjutsushi no Monogatari

altTitles.ja: 薬屋経営してみたら、利益が恐ろしいことになりました ～平民だからと追放された元宮廷錬金術士の物語

altTitles.en: I Tried Running a Pharmacy, but the Profit Turned Out to be Terrible ~The Story of a Former Court Alchemist who was Banished for Being a Commoner

description.en:
The exiled alchemist achieves great success in this otherworldly apothecary fantasy!

Ira was recognized as a court alchemist, despite being a commoner, because of her talent in alchemy. Using alchemy, she could refine recovery potions, antidotes, dark potions, poison potions, etc., but she was fired from her position as a court alchemist by the second prince, who did not approve of commoners.

At a loss, Ira rents a corner of an innkeeper she knows and starts an apothecary, and the store quickly becomes very prosperous due to the variety of medicines and their outstanding effects. Meanwhile, the second prince, who has banished Ira, hires a new court alchemist from the aristocracy, but the results are not what he expected, and he is gradually driven into a corner. The second prince, who has been thinking of a plan for a comeback, takes an unexpected action....
